dependencies.description:
User-generated content on the Web and in social media is often dirty.
Preprocess your scraped data with clean-text to create a normalized text
representation.
dependencies.name: py-clean-text

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description:
This package provides encoding and decoding routines that enable the
serialization and deserialization of numerical and array data types
provided by numpy using the highly efficient msgpack format.
Serialization of Python's native complex data types is also supported.
dependencies.name: py-msgpack-numpy

dependencies.description:
The Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK) is a Python package for natural
language processing.
dependencies.name: py-nltk

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.
dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
spaCy is a library for advanced Natural Language Processing in Python
and Cython.
dependencies.name: py-spacy

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
This toolkit contains tools to extract conversational features and
analyze social phenomena in conversations, using a single unified
interface inspired by (and compatible with) scikit-learn.
name: py-convokit

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
